message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm starting with a 70/30 split in my favor. This is a good deal for you considering the inflation.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a more balanced 55/45 split.  Consider the inflation working against us both - let's settle this now.
Bob, your 55/45 split isn't really fair considering how much faster the inflation is hitting you. I'm coming down a bit to 65/35, let's close this deal and avoid further losses.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  The inflation is hurting us both. I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this now.  A fair deal saves us both from further losses.
